Loudly \w I|strong="H1961"\w* cry \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* 
d Lord
d*: \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* 
d Lord
d* plead loudly \w for|strong="H8605"\w* mercy,

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* pour \w my|strong="H3068"\w* complaint before \w him|strong="H6963"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* tell \w my|strong="H3068"\w* troubles \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6963"\w*.

When \w my|strong="H8210"\w* spirit \w is|strong="H6440"\w* faint \w within|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w my|strong="H8210"\w* path \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w known|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. \w In|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H6869"\w* am wont \w to|strong="H6440"\w* walk \w in|strong="H6440"\w*, \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H6869"\w* hidden \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trap \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* look \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H1980"\w*; \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w friend|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w*. \w No|strong="H3045"\w* place \w of|strong="H7307"\w* refuge \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w left|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w care|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* cry \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3225"\+w*\nd*: \w I|strong="H5315"\w* say, ‘\w My|strong="H7200"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4498"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*, \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w living|strong="H5315"\w*.’

Attend \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* piercing \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* very weak \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w*. Save \w me|strong="H2416"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* pursue \w me|strong="H2416"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* too strong \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2416"\w*.

Free \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* prison, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* \w give|strong="H7181"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* name, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* righteous \w are|strong="H7291"\w* patiently waiting \w till|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* show \w your|strong="H3588"\w* bounty \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.
